description.@en: An explosion of shimmering light emits from an area, searing all within its purifying rays.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you can conjure a twinkling expulsion that rages in the target location where you cast it. All those who are caught within the Explosion Template who fail to Resist with an Awareness Test suffer a -30 Base Chance to all Agility-based and Combat-based Skill Tests. In addition, they reduce their Combat Movement down by 9 (to a minimum of 1). Those who do Resist instead suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in physical Peril and cannot Counterspell, Dodge or Parry while standing in the Explosion Template. Remaining within the Explosion Template requires additional Awareness Tests to Resist against harm.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but those caught in the Explosion cannot Resist, suffering both Effects.
